title: Battersea Parker 2
description: Malcolm and Dexter are back! This time armed with girlfriend's Sally and dippy Candy always two steps behind them, not forgetting the young blonde who has recently confessed she's with child and that one of them will become a father very soon. It's a journey for the boys that takes them past the morning sickness stage, right up to the contraction part, with the usual Dexter and Malcolm chaos going on in between. Question is, who will turn out to be the daddy?
author: Jimmy Tudeski
